title: Offset List Elements | Challenge
description: In Python, lists are a commonly used data structure. Sometimes, you may need to move certain elements of a list to the end of the list. In this challenge, you will write a function that takes a list and an offset as arguments and returns a new list with the specified amount of elements moved to the end of the list.

meta.title: Offset List Elements: Python Coding Challenge
meta.description: Learn how to move elements to the end or beginning of a Python list using the offset() function.
meta.keywords: coding challenge, python, offset, list, data structure

verify.name: Verify Student Python Script Execution
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
